name: Tavaana E-Learning Institute for Iranian Civil Society Reviews

review.title: “Not a good experience”
review.pros: Pros – Learned some good skills, saw how to not run an organization, good exposure to the struggles of a small non-profit. I was given some cool projects but after awhile it felt like work for the sake of keeping me busy.
review.cons: Cons – sketchy work, little transparency, they make you do a bunch of work and never actually use it, unknown funders, little effort to engage younger staff, make workers feel like there replaceable, extremely poor management style. This was a good experience until I my work was placed to the side for a year, then used without giving me any credit.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Treat your employees with more respect.
